Keywords: Frightful Four , Intelligencia , Scientist
Real Name: Bentley Wittman
Team Up
1
THEMED TEAM-UP: FRIGHTFUL FOUR: If Wizard is on a Frightful Four themed team, at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a friendly character with a "Frightful Four" trait on your Sideline. Wizard can use that character's "Frightful Four" trait until you choose again.
Special Powers
FORM THE NEW FRIGHTFUL FOUR: At the beginning of the game, you may replace up to 4 friendly characters with the same number of characters from your Sideline on their starting clicks. All replacement characters must have the Frightful Four keyword and different names. The total points of the replacement characters can't exceed the total points of the replaced characters.
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: YOU MEDDLING FOOLS ARE NO MATCH FOR MY INTELLECT!: Friendly characters with the Frightful Four keyword within range and line of fire have PROTECTED: Outwit.
INTELLECT TO SPARE:: Leadership, Outwit, Perplex. When he uses Leadership, on a result of 4 choose Outwit -or- Perplex. This turn, Wizard can use the chosen power twice.
Trade Wizard Want Wizard

May 22, 2021
Goop
This guy is your only source for Leadership outwit and perplex for Frightful Four. Its pretty critical he stays on your force for that reason. The ability to switch out figs based on what you are playing is HUGE also. Giving the team Protected outwit is also great. Awesome piece.
March 1, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
Killer piece. His powers and abilities make any incarnation of the frightful four truly terrifying
November 15, 2020
MrBill
FORM THE NEW FRIGHTFUL FOUR has been one of my favorite toys. I like the fantastic 4's version, but this one is somehow better with all the universal trait grants. I love running the Frightful Four because of it!
